Map Pathway IDs to Pathway Names

Source: R/findpathsnames.R
findpathsnames.Rd

Retrieves pathway names for given pathway IDs using cached KEGG data.

findpathsnames(pathwayid, pathways_data)

Arguments

pathwayid

Character vector of KEGG pathway IDs (e.g., c("hsa00010", "hsa00020"))

pathways_data

Pathway data object from `getkeggdata()`

Value

A data frame with two columns:

  • pathwayID: Input pathway ID

  • Description: Pathway name (or "Not found" if ID not in data)

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
kegg_data <- getkeggdata("hsa", cache_dir = "./cache")
findpathsnames(c("hsa00010", "hsa00020"), pathways_data = kegg_data)
} # }
